amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to report to Congress on the status of its 2006 Atlantic hurricane season disaster response plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3630 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3630 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S3847; text: CR S3847) To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to report to Congress on the status of its 2006 Atlantic hurricane season disaster response plan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3630 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3630 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Landrieu.
